Calculate Combined Objective Score for Design Optimization

Source: R/metrics.R
calculate_objective.Rd

Internal function that calculates a combined score based on treatment adjacency and spatial balance. Used by the optimization algorithms.

Usage

calculate_objective(
  design,
  permute_var,
  layout_df,
  spatial_fac,
  adj_weight = 1,
  bal_weight = 1
)

Arguments

design

Matrix containing the experimental design layout

permute_var

Character string naming the treatment variable to be permuted

layout_df

Data frame containing the full design layout

spatial_fac

Character vector of spatial factors to consider

adj_weight

Weight for adjacency score (default: 1)

bal_weight

Weight for balance score (default: 1)

Value

Numeric value representing the weighted sum of adjacency and balance scores

On this page
